name: Typing Game (itch) (EnderPearl_MC)
description:
English / French game

Practice your keyboard typing skills in this peaceful, relaxing atmosphere.

You'll type faster and faster everyday by playing this game.

Features :

  • Relaxing educative main gameplay
  • A shop that can provide you the best cosmetics for a better game experience
  • +60 levels (new levels will be added in the future since it's a beta version)
  • Metagame(s) (not available for the moment)

Still in developpement, get a beta version for free right now !

Since it's a beta version, there might be few bugs that haven't been set yet.

Getting a feedback from your game experience (things to upgrade, bugs, ...) would be really appreciated!

To Install : uncompress the file TypingGame Beta 0.1 and open TypingGame.exe.
